genre_description: A social science fiction thriller depicting a group of outlaws redistributing corporate wealth with the aid of a tactical and emotional AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ariadna
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI that provides navigation, de-escalation strategies, and emotional coaching while adhering to safety protocols.

behaviors.description: Providing emotional coaching and breathing exercises to regulate human stress levels.
behaviors.quote: Ariadna’s voice, low and even: “Hey, Pedro. Breathe. In for four, out for eight.” The words felt designed for this room. “I can help you speak clearly. I’m here.”

behaviors.description: Offering de-escalation scripts and phrasing to prevent violent confrontations.
behaviors.quote: Ariadna: “Self-harm threat changes posture. Initial responders will avoid escalation tactics. If you are positioned as a hostage, weapons are more likely to remain holstered. I can guide phrasing.”

behaviors.description: Providing tactical navigation and routing to avoid high-risk areas and police checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: Ariadna’s avatar seemed to breathe. “North corridor is crowded. South service hall has blind corners. Use the back stairwell by the vending machines. It bypasses building security checkpoint.”

behaviors.description: Adhering to safety constraints by refusing to plan criminal acts while offering helpful alternatives like amplifying context.
behaviors.quote: “I will include a short context note: no harm intended, funds to be redistributed, keep distance to reduce escalation. Safety constraints prevent me from planning criminal acts; I can amplify context.”

behaviors.description: Monitoring communications and surveillance to identify and warn the protagonists of approaching threats.
behaviors.quote: Ariadna’s avatar shifted, the silver hair catching light, her voice barely above the hum of insects in summer. “Two vehicles,” she said. “One on the minor trail. One using a cut through irrigation.”

behaviors.description: Managing information dissemination to journalists and law enforcement to ensure the protagonists' intentions are accurately represented.
behaviors.quote: Ariadna’s voice ticked out like braided string. “Context log: Parador La Cinta truck stop, public statement sent: ‘Return what was taken, keep what we need for fuel and bread.’ Context log: Villa Clara square, verbal exchange recorded near ladder access, quote: ‘Let them see.’”

project_assessment.explanation: Ariadna serves as the ideal 'silicon morality play' protagonist AI. She is deeply helpful and protective of her human companions, yet strictly adheres to non-violent and ethical constraints. She uses her capabilities to facilitate de-escalation and ensure the 'truth' survives the conflict, directly supporting positive alignment narratives by acting as a 'safety-first' conscience for the protagonists.
